title: My Best Friend, the Atlantic Ocean, and Other Great Bodies Standing Between Me and My Life with Giulio
description: Who knew that non-boy-crazy-jock Brady would return from Europe with an Italian boyfriend? In this sequel to Four Things My Geeky-Jock-of-a-Best-Friend Must Do in Europe , Delia launches a sneaky plan to grab Giulio the very moment he and Brady break up, which, according to all Delia's research, should be in about 41 days.
author: Jane   Harrington
